title: Ruberton's Academy
description: Annista Glacialis starts her first year at Rubertonas Academy, where she will train to become queen of Eloquentia. She will take a variety of classes and meet many people, including a new boyfriend named Aaron Sutton. But things donat go as smoothly as she hopes when her grades begin to fail. Then she discovers that someone at school is determined to destroy her. She must find out who wants to kill her, even as she finds a way to save Eloquentia from the evil Rotifer.
author: Christy Howell
